Subscribing to Fermilab mailing lists

To subscribe or unsubscribe to Fermilab mailing lists see Fermilab Mailing Lists.

To subscribe to Fermilab mailing lists:
  1. Click on the subscribe link which should pop up an email window.
  2. Replace FIRSTNAME LASTNAME with your first and last name in the body of the email.
  3. Leave the subject blank.
  4. Be sure you are sending the message from the email address that you wish to subscribe.
  5. Send the mail.
To unsubscribe to Fermilan mailing lists:
  1. Click on the unsubscribe link which should pop up an email window.
  2. Be sure you are sending the message from the email address that you wish to unsubscribe.
  3. Send the mail.
